CHRISTOPH ER Almaraz may be called the foun- der of this colony3 he certainly was the oc- casion of its being founded. A Spaniardv by descent, and born in the country of St. Iago, he was taken captive when a boy by the Abi- pones, amongst whom he was brought up, and became a savage in countenance, lan guage, mind, ancl manners.
